job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwe are seeking multiple npl machine learning engineers for direct hire opportunity with a top client the qualified candidate will be specialized in natural language processing and understanding or what we like to call an apprentice nlp wizard to help grow our clients current ai solutions with creative and innovative approaches ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe qualified candidate will work with inhouse and contracted platform development team and work with the clients technology team to build a groundbreaking knowledge platform we are looking for an engineer as passionate as we are about building machines that truly understand language and can aid subject matter experts better navigate their workflowsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtresponsibilitiesltpgtltpgtas our ml engineer you will be responsible for building end to end ml models particularly in areas where labelled data is either scarce or nonexisting outofthebox thinking will be required to bring solutions to problems that do not have an established solution managing sourcecode version control discipline git and overseeing code delivery into our projects testing and deployment we are looking for someone with strong engineering discipline and a pragmatic focus on delivering functional code not allegiance to any one language we value creativity the hacker ethos the nearobsessive focus on building something that will make the future come a bit closer into focus this role will report to the lead ai engineerltpgtltpgtthe ml engineer can be based remotely us or europe but will need to work during business hours in us eastern time our client offers a competitive base salarybenefits package and equityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe qualified candidate willltpgtltulgtltligtooze with passion take risk and not be afraid of the unknownltligtltligtbroken and repaired code written by another personltligtltligtseek to push the limits for successltligtltligtself starter who can be productive from the first dayltligtltligta sense of humor and calm under pressureltligtltligtjust the right amount of egoltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtrequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtyrs of recent experience in python yrs will be considered if experience was engrossed in pyhtonltligtltligtdemonstrable experience in all aspects of the ml lifecycle processing training evaluating deploying serving monitoring preferably in the nlp domainltligtltligtare curious and somewhat educated formally or informally about cognition and languageltligtltligt yr experience with collaborative software development practices ie source control issues milestones code reviews etcltligtltligtcan work and have worked late andor early under the influence of a deadline or inspirationltligtltligtcan communicate and work well with nontechnical or lesstechnical folksltligtltligtcan collaborate well with team members who are located across the globeltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtpreferred qualificationsltpgtltulgtltligtmscphd in computer science ai or related fields from a top tier universityltligtltligtexpertise in one or more of the following domains natural language understanding nlu and natural language generation nlg graph algorithms machine learningltligtltligtstrong background in developing and deploying ml models participation in kaggle competitions is a plusltligtltligtpast participation in the technology role in a prior venturefunded startupltligtltligtself starter who can be productive from the first dayltligtltligta sense of humor and calm under
